detailsOfAchievement: Activities of the Organization during year 2015-16. The organization has been undertaking multidisciplinary activities in the area since its inception in the year 2006. Few of the remarkable activities worth highlighting are as: a) Making Audio Visual Documentation and Archiving of Buddhist Monastic and Folk dances under Ministry of Culture, GoI. b) Organizing medical health camps across region in collaboration with 4th Bn ITBP Dirang and also with NRCY ICAR Dirang at Thembang Village, Salari Village, Rahung Village etc. c) Distribution of Blankets, Study Tables, Hygiene utilities to Primary School Students at Thembang Residential School in collaboration with ICAR-National Research Centre on Yak. d) Allotment of kitchen wares to Thembang Monastery. e) Encouraging the production of local garments, handicrafts & its use especially among youths. f) Massive plantation drive in & around the Dirang rural outskirts. g) Intensive Awareness programmes on Environment, Biodiversity its significance & conservation aspects. h) Training on vermin composting & organic farming at Thembang village. i) Encouraging the youths to undergo training on revered pantomime dance forms of the Himalayan region. j) Promotion of tourism in the area, Mon- Thembang heritage Village. k) Organized seminar on the need to preserve the Himalayan art & culture at Thembang Gompa.

detailsOfAchievement: So far Our Society has formed 26 Natural Resource Management Group (NaRM-Gs) under by covering 20 villages with 60 Self Help Groups(SHGs) under NERCORMP-III Changlang Arunachal Pradesh,The work undertaken by NaRM-Gs and SHGs are supervise by the Supervising Officer and Community Cordinators of our NGO staffs. Organised Free medical camp in the interior villages of Kantang circle,Khimiyang circle , Changlang circle and Yatdam circle in Changlang district Arunachal Pradesh in collaboration with the Seva Bharati Purbanchal and National Medicos Organisation since last three years ,taken up self drinking water programmed, poultry & piggery programmed and also construct individual household toilets in the interior villages.Our Society are also taking up horticulture base Large Cardamom garden under Khimiyang and Kantang circle. Organised awareness campaign on drugs de-addiction camp at Khimiyang,Yatdam and Kantang circle,Awareness campaign on preservation of old age traditional art & culture of Tutsa tribes & Tangsa tribes of Changlang district. Health and hygiene,child education programmed once in a year. skill development training for youths, social welfare programmed conducted in many villages specially on sustainable development of cash crops like kitchen garden etc. Organised social service camp in the interior villages under Khimiyang circle on 2nd October since last 3 years. Raksha bandhan programmed with students and teachers at Assam Rifle Camp at Changlang to bring peace and harmony among the civil and para-military. Organised awareness programmed with students and public on HIV- AIDS, maintenance of law & order problems and to co-ordinate with district administration and civil police.

isuues.value: Art & Culture,Differently Abled,Education & Literacy,Environment & Forests,Tribal Affairs

detailsOfAchievement: Tsun-Gon-Thoog-Jee-Ling Society was established in 2002 and developed into a residential school on proper lines based on modern education system into the framework of traditional education system of the monastery. It was established to impart monastic as well as modern education to the nun students. The following major activities of Tsun-Gon-Thoog-Jee-Ling Society as follow: 1. Established a residential school for the education of nun students, where basic education is imparted free of cost. 2. Conducted various workshops and seminars on the preservation and promotion the rich cultural heritage of the region which face various challenges for survival in todays fast changing world. 3. Imparted traditional monastic education to younger resident nuns with a balance incorporation of modern languages and scientific knowledge with objective of producing erudite scholars and philosophers who are capable of preserving and carrying on the ancient cultural heritages of the region in the context of modern day situation. 4. Prepared students for higher learning and research in the field of the Buddhist Culture, Tibetology and Himalayan Studies, art and culture with adequate background in various disciplines of learning, with thorough knowledge of modern research and advanced technique. 5. Inculcated awareness in the preservation of environment and cultural resources of the region. 6. Inculcated deep feeling of patriotism, national integrity, brotherhood, and developing a greater sense of harmony in the country. 7. Produced ideal citizens who work for the development of the nation and its citizens. 8. Made full utilization of modern scientific and technological resources in preserving and promoting the age old wisdom of India for the benefit of entire sentient beings as a whole and Schedule Tribes community in particular. 9. Provided free medical treatments to the monk patients along with needy patients belonging to poor family background. 10. Planted saplings around the nunnery and other vulnerable locations to prevent landslides and other natural calamities. 11. Conducted cleanliness drive at important public buildings such as schools, hospitals and market areas as a part of Swacch Bharat Abhiyan.

detailsOfAchievement: people have started to avoid jhum cultivation ( shifting) which involves burning of forest land for new cultivation areas. With inputs and awareness from our NGO with support from state forest Department the jhum cultivation is a history now. people are more aware on the issues of the climate change and its impacts.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The NGO was founded in the year 2017 but registered in 2021. As the NGO was not registered , it could not get any grant/ sanction from any like minded NGO or the Govt. The NGO had organised series of awareness camps and seminars etc on various issues on self help basis and contributions.
no fund / grant sanctioned form any Govt or other like minded organisations.

detailsOfAchievement: Textile and Handloom weaving product items are in the business already and established within the district. Has a major attraction of the customers of our product items.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: We have not yet received any funding from State or Central Government till date. Yourth Yorbii Saapho Multipurpose Cooperative Society has been running the business with self investment funding of the society. It aims to bring all the individual indigenous weaver among Lower Subansiri district of Arunachal Pradesh to bring in a cluster and to form a competitive modern traditional industry.

detailsOfAchievement: AIMS OF NGO - TO PRESERVE THE DYING RIVERS TO REJUVENATE. TO EDUCATE THE MASSES ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF RIVERS AND TO CONDUCT A RESEARCH ABOUT THE WATER POLLUTION .

sourceOfFunds.purpose: THE NGO WAS FORMED WITH A AN AIM TO FIGHT FOR JUSTICE OF RIVER BY LAUCHING INTENSIVE MASS AWARENESS CAMPAING TO PRESERVE, PROTECT, CONSERVE AND REJUVENATE THE DYING STREAMS AND RIVERS ACROSS THE STATE, OUR NGO HAS ORGANISED CLEAN UP RIVER MISSION IN THE VARIOUS RIVERS OF THE STATE SPECIALLY THE DYING SENKI RIVER WHICH PASSES THROUGH THE HEARTS OF THE STATE CAPITAL i.e ITANAGAR AND NAHARLAGUN CITIES. THE NGO HAS BROUGHT MANY CASES RELATING TO RIVER POLUTION BEFORE THE NATIONAL GREEN TRIBUNAL .

title: ziro valley charity mission society

isuues.name: Key Issues
isuues.value: Animal Husbandry, Dairying & Fisheries,Art & Culture,Biotechnology,Children,Civic Issues,Disaster Management,Education & Literacy,Environment & Forests,Health & Family Welfare,Any Other

detailsOfAchievement: The Ziro Valley Charity Mission Society (ZVCMS) was established on 9th December, 1998 and was registered under the society registration Act. 1860, extension in Arunachal Pradesh 1978 bearing register No. SR/ITA/2055/in year 2003. The Society aim to promoting of any art; science or any other field of socio-economic education, propagate for removal of society evils, custom or render or promote self help to overcome any of these evils particularly for the poor or weaker section of the society and established the school, hostel for orphan and arrange medical aid, free elementary education to the poor children and other assistance necessary for living to the needy person. Through the aim of charity Mission and promote modern methods of Medicinal plant and Aromatic plant garden, Horticulture Animal & Husbandry, Fisheries Handloom & Handicraft. The Society is spreading an environment conservation message to different part of the state through various network to all those nature loving people to crate conservation awareness in most effective manner through the school children, banner, poster, Newsletter, Pam plate, Magazine etc. and organizing the variety programmed as per Govt. of India prescribed.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Construction of girls hostel for the better education benefited and also giving the good education toward the scholastic and co-scholastic and maintaining the health and hygienic for the rural area students especially for tribal people.
